dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3393 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 12208 North 19th Avenue in Phoenix, Arizona, as the “Officer Zane T. Coolidge Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Hamadeh of Arizona (for himself, Mr. Ciscomani, Mr. Stanton, Mr. Biggs of Arizona, Ms. Ansari, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Crane, and Mr. Schweikert) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 12208 North 19th Avenue in Phoenix, Arizona, as the Officer Zane T. Coolidge Post Office.

section.header: Officer Zane T. Coolidge Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 12208 North 19th Avenue in Phoenix, Arizona, shall be known and designated as the Officer Zane T. Coolidge Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Officer Zane T. Coolidge Post Office.
